name: 4chan N0Lif3 v2 (1/2015)
description:
The ultimate late night lurker experience for 4chan is here with N0Lif3 v2! The sleek black and green minimalist userstyle which is not only very appealing, but very easy on the eyes.

This theme is best used without any 3rd party 4chan extensions. I, personally, only use the one built-in to 4chan. I do not guarantee that the theme will function correctly with 3rd party extensions.

If you like my 4chan theme and want to show thanks in a direct way, take a look at my amazon wishlist or donate via Paypal:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/37K8UB06OM1HQ/
https://www.twitchalerts.com/donate/n0lif3
additional_info:
Over 10,000 installs and still not a single gift purchased for me off of my amazon wishlist.

1/4/2015

We have an Archives page for almost every board now. I just had to N0Lif3-ify it a tiny bit :DDDDD

10/3/2014

After 5 years, imageshack killed the hosting of the custom 4chan logo I had up. Here's a new logo I put together. Otherwise, no other changes in this update.
